about.text:
Work Quest is a social project based on the blockchain technology for finding work and solving any tasks from the employer's side in quest mode. Are you looking for a job? A work quest will help you find a quest next to you and your city. Do you need workers to carry out the goals? Just create a quest on the site of the work quest. The service assumes the warranty obligations for performing quests. Employer funds are kept with us , if the employee gives a confirmation of the performance of work, he receives a deposit of funds on his account. The system of ratings, reviews and a list of completed quests will help to easily find honest people and the best specialists.

          Our goal is to simplify the communication between the employer and the employee, to help employ millions of people, to improve their financial situation, to solve the lifelong problem of finding reliable professionals in all sectors to create a progressive digital economy built on the principles of trust, mutual respect and the well-being of all its participants.

1.title: Gold Plus Package
1.desc: Notifications for employees who were looking for quests, via an offer to review the quest that has been promoted by the employer. The employee will be invited to complete the quest in based on the most recent search categories of the employee. Plus the ability to choose any category and any location to promote the quest.

2.title: Gold Package
2.desc: Notifications for employees who were looking for quests with a direct offer to review the promoted quest based on the most recent search categories of the employee. Plus the ability to choose three categories and three locations to promote the quest.

3.title: Silver Package
3.desc: Pin quest on the main page for three hours, with the ability to choose two categories and two locations for promotion the quest.

4.title: Bronze Package
4.desc: Pin the quest on the main page for one hour, with the ability to choose one category and one location to promote the quest.

bridge.title: WorkQuest Bridge
bridge.desc: Secure and fast way to bring cross-chain assets between WorkNet, Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain.

collateral.title: Collateral

staking.title: WorkQuest Staking
staking.desc: Make your assets work. Stake your assets into DeFi staking or Locked staking to increase staking income.

pension.title: Retirement program
pension.desc: You can select a percentage of each completed quest which will then be automatically credited to your retirement account, or simply deposit an amount of your choice. The pool of funds is invested on the employee's behalf, and the earnings on the investments generate income to the worker upon their retirement.

referral.title: Referral program
referral.desc: Refer & Earn is our scheme that lets you earn rewards  for every friend you refer who becomes a customer and subsequently completes a quest. Your referred friends save, too, by getting a free registration.

p2p.title: P2P insurance
p2p.desc: Peer-to-peer (P2P) insurance is a product that allows a group of insureds to pool their capital, self-organize, and self-administer their own insurance. The core idea of P2P is that a set of like-minded people with mutual interests group their insurance policies together introducing a sense of control, trust, and transparency while at the same time reducing costs. This model of insurance combines traditional pooling and sharing of losses with current technology and innovations, providing a product for increasingly savvy consumers who require transparency in an on-demand economy.

savings.title: Savings product
savings.desc: A cryptocurrency savings account gives you access to the cryptocurrency market while allowing you to earn interest like a traditional bank savings account does. If you're interested in long-term cryptocurrency investing, a crypto savings account can help you accrue interest while keeping your coins safe.

crediting.title: Lending
crediting.desc: Similar to a traditional loan, the crypto loan amount is deposited in the borrower's bank account and then the borrower pays EMIs to the lender. Once the amount is paid back in full, the lender releases the collateral that acted as security.

mining.title: Liquidity mining
mining.desc: is a DeFi (decentralized finance) mechanism in which participants supply cryptocurrencies into liquidity pools, and being rewarded with fees and tokens based on their share of the total pool liquidity.

pension.howToTakePart: How to participate in the pension program?
pension.pensionPlanText: A pension plan may allow a worker to contribute part of their current income from wages into an investment plan to help fund retirement.
pension.timeRemainsUntilTheEndOfThePeriod: Time remains until the end of the period:
pension.prolongText: This will prolong pension program for 1 year

faq1.question: How do you qualify for a pension?
faq1.answer: You do not need to have worked for an employer for a certain number of years to be eligible for retirement benefits. Just select the percentage of each quest you want to accumulate in your account. Your retirement benefit usually increases as you accumulate funds. The additional percentage will be earned automated by using funds in the lending program.

faq2.question: How is the 'additional percentage' calculated?
faq2.answer: The funds of the pension fund will be blocked in the loan agreement. APY varies depending on changes in the credit protocol. The profit can make from 3-6%

faq3.question: How do pension plans work?
faq3.answer: You do not need to have worked for an employer for a certain number of years to be eligible for retirement benefits. Just select the percentage of each quest you want to accumulate in your account. Your retirement benefit usually increases as you accumulate funds. The additional percentage will be earned automated by using funds in the lending program.

faq4.question: How many years do you need to work to be vested in the pension plan?
faq4.answer:
According to WorkQuest rules, anyone can open a private sector savings plan. After the first three years, you will have the opportunity to receive 100% of the accumulated funds.
You can continue to accumulate for another year or withdraw funds in full to your wallet.

faq5.question: What is a good pension?
faq5.answer: What is a good pension amount? Some advisers recommend that you save up 10 times your average working-life salary by the time you retire. So if your average salary is $30,000 you should aim for a pension pot of around $300,000. Another top tip is that you should save 12.5 per cent of your monthly salary.

faq6.question: Is monthly pension taxable?
faq6.answer: Your monthly pension payment almost always counts as taxable income, and you'll need to make sure that you have enough taxes withheld from your pension payments to satisfy the Internal Revenue Service

faq7.question: Can I take all my pension in one go?
faq7.answer: After minimum period 3 years retirement program, you can withdraw some or all of your pension savings in one go.

faq8.question: Can I cancel my pension and get the money?
faq8.answer: If you withdraw after the minimum 3 years has passed or on the day of the annual renewal, you will receive back all the money you have already paid. If you opt out later, you will not be able to receive a refund of your payments until the end of the extended period (usually 1 year).

faq9.question: Can I draw my pension and still work?
faq9.answer: Can I take my pension early and continue to work? The short answer is yes. These days, there is no set retirement age. You can carry on working for as long as you like, and can also access to pensions program.

faq10.question: What happens if I Overfund my pension?
faq10.answer: We have no restrictions on the amount of savings. The entire accumulated amount will be at your disposal at the end of the program period.

saving.withdrawModalBody: The amount of locked funds and the accumulated interest will be credited to your wallet
saving.templateText:
Committed to Holding your cryptocurrency?
An easy way to lend and earn with locked savings.
saving.faq1: What are Locked Savings? Committed to holding your crypto?
saving.faq2: What happens to my funds on the day I subscribe to a Locked Savings product?
saving.faq3: What happens to my funds on the value date of a Locked Savings product?
saving.faq4: What happens to my funds on the redemption date of a Locked Savings product?
saving.faq5: How is the average annual return (APR) calculated?
saving.faq6: Am I guaranteed to earn interest on WorkQuest Savings products even if the crypto markets go down?
saving.ans1: Now you can earn interest at the same time! Subscribe your crypto to locked savings periods for higher interest earnings.
saving.ans2: On the day of subscription, WorkQuest Savings will deduct the funds for subscription from your WUSD wallet.
saving.ans3: On the value date, WorkQuest Savings will distribute the Locked Savings product to your savings wallet, and your saving product will start to accrue interest.
saving.ans4: On the redemption date, you will see both the initial tokens committed to the subscription and the interest accrued in your WorkQuest account ‘balances’. This process will be automatic.
saving.ans5: The average annual return (APR) uses the average daily interest rate from the past 7 days, multiplied by 365.
saving.ans6: Yes. The interest rate on each product is guaranteed.
saving.depositModalBody: Your crypto will lock for a specific period, and you will begin earning interest.
saving.withdrawText: The amount of locked funds and the accumulated interest will be credited to your wallet

pointsText.point1: An annual contribution of 1000 WUSD, payment in the event of an insured event 833.333333 WUSD.
Annual premium 2000 WUSD, payment in case of an insured event 1666.6667 WUSD.
An annual contribution of 3000 WUSD, payment in the event of an insured event of 2500 WUSD.

insuring.youWillCertifyTheInsuredEvent: You will certify the insured event?

planPoints.point2: Payment upon occurrence of an insured event: {count} WUSD

faq1.question: What does P2P mean in insurance ?
faq1.answer: Peer-to-peer (P2P) insurance is a product that allows a group of insureds to pool their capital, self-organize, and self-administer their own insurance

faq2.question: How does p2p insurance work ?
faq2.answer: Peer-to-peer insurance, or P2P insurance, enables groups of individuals to insure each other. The members of the group pool their money to insure against a risk affecting them. If a group member suffers an insurable loss, their claim is paid directly from the pool of money contributed by each member

faq3.question: How do you do peer to peer insurance ?
faq3.answer: Ask for a “peer-to-peer” evaluation. In a peer-to-peer evaluation, your insurance fund will speak with another fund members about why the service or therapies are medically necessary. You can upload to the chat all the necessary documents and doctors' opinions, which will prove the legality of your case and create a vote for decision-making by the members of the foundation. If the majority of the fund votes in favor, you will receive the payout to your wallet.

faq4.question: What will happen to the fund if the insured event does not occur within a year ?
faq4.answer: At the end of the year, all users will receive notifications with a vote where they will be asked to vote for the extension of the fund for another year, which will automatically double your fund and payments in the event of an insured event or divide the fund between the fund participants.

faq5.question: Who is a fund administrator ?
faq5.answer: To ensure that each fund participant does not waste time considering all insured events, he will be able to delegate his voting rights to the fund manager for a small fee

faq6.question: What is the standard size of the insurance fund ?
faq6.answer: Funds are formed by 10 users depending on the selected protection level

faq7.question: How is the amount of payment from the insurance fund calculated ?
faq7.answer:
An example of calculating the fund for the first year: Minimum protection - an annual premium of 1000 WUSD, payment in the event of an insured event 833.333333 WUSD.
10 members of the fund * 1000 WUSD / 12 months = 833.333333 WUSD.
In case of continuation of the fund for the next year, the size of the fund and the insurance payment are doubled.

faq8.question: What is the guarantee of security from withdrawals of funds by one member of the fund ?
faq8.answer: All members of the fund will keep funds in a multi-signature wallet, where any decisions are made only by a majority vote.

staking.title: Staking

delivery.title: Fixed delivery
delivery.subtitle: After the employee has determined the optimal job offer and consented to the execution of the quest, an agreement is concluded between the employee and the employer.

short.title: Short-term
short.subtitle: A quest that needs to be completed over the coming days. To indicate short-term delivery (from 24 to 72 hours), you need to start the quest as soon as possible.

urgent.title: Urgent
urgent.subtitle: A quest that needs to be completed urgently. To indicate urgent delivery (from 1 to 24 hours), you need to start the quest almost immediately

top.title: Top Ranked EMP.
top.subtitle: Top ranked employee/employer — this means that there has been a large number of successfully completed quests, with an average score from user reviews of over 4.5 points. Requires passing KYC (verified account), phone number verification, three social media verification, and filling out employment information.

reliable.title: Reliable EMP.
reliable.subtitle: Reliable employee/employer a large number of successfully completed quests, with the average score from user reviews of at least 4 points. Requires passing KYC (verified account), phone number verification and verification in two social networks.

verified.title: Verified EMP.
verified.subtitle: Verified employee/employer is a validated user with a small number of successfully completed quests, and an average user score of at least 3.5 points. Requires passing KYC (verified account) and verification of one of the social networks.

create.title: Create a quest
create.subtitle: Create a work proposal with a detailed description of the task, requirements for candidates and a technical description.

results.title: Search Results
results.subtitle: Search for a job offer by selected search categories.

workers.title: Search Workers
workers.subtitle: Search for workers by selected search categories.

details.title: View details
details.subtitle: Each work proposal (quest) is displayed with basic brief information, the user can use the "View details" button and view all detailed information related to this quest.

map.title: Show map
map.subtitle: Enable or Disable the map to search for employees or employers.

button.title: Share button
button.subtitle: Share your profile or created quest on social networks

raise.title: Raise views
raise.subtitle: Promoting a quest or profile of an employee and employer in the search.

specialization.title: Specialization
specialization.subtitle: List of industries requiring specialized skill sets.

rating.title: Rating
rating.subtitle: Employee rating: Verified employee/Reliable employee/Higher level of trust employee.

priority.title: All priority

time.title: Added time

specialization.title: Specialization
specialization.subtitle: List of industries requiring special skills.

quests.title: Quests
quests.subtitle: Select a job offer: Quests (all type of work), Specialized quests (task that require specialized skills), permanent job (job search by categories).

price.title: Price
price.subtitle: A filter to search for quests, ordered from the lowest price to the highest.

time.title: Added time
time.subtitle: Filter to search for quests by publication date, from the newest to the latest created, or vice versa.

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Comments and reviews that users leave about each other after completing the quest.

active.title: Active quests
active.subtitle: The quest in which you are currently active.

invited.title: Invited quests
invited.subtitle: List of quests that you have been invited to complete.

favorite.title: Favorite
favorite.subtitle: A quest that is added to favorites for frequent interaction.

goldPlus.title: Gold Plus Package
goldPlus.subtitle: Notifications for employees who were looking for quests, via an offer to review the quest that has been promoted by the employer. The employee will be invited to complete the quest in based on the most recent search categories of the employee. Plus the ability to choose any category and any location to promote the quest.

gold.title: Gold package
gold.subtitle: Notifications for employees who were looking for quests with a direct offer to review the promoted quest based on the most recent search categories of the employee. Plus the ability to choose three categories and three locations to promote the quest.

silver.title: Silver package
silver.subtitle: Pin quest on the main page for three hours, with the ability to choose two categories and two locations for promotion the quest.

bronze.title: Bronze package
bronze.subtitle: Pin the quest on the main page for one hour, with the ability to choose one category and one location to promote the quest.

topRanked.title: Top Ranked
topRanked.desc: Notifications for employees who were looking for quests with a direct offer to review the promoted quest based on the most recent search categories of the employee. Plus the ability to choose three categories and three locations to promote the quest.

verified.title: Verified
verified.desc: Pin quest on the main page for three hours, with the ability to choose two categories and two locations for promotion the quest.

reliable.title: Reliable
reliable.desc: Pin the quest on the main page for one hour, with the ability to choose one category and one location to promote the quest.
